rows.messages: [ "Pick a nearby object or place", "Let's slowly and calmly walk there, keeping in mind your breathing" ]
rows.ellicitMsg: How many steps did it take to reach that object or place?

rows.messages: [ "The world is surrounded by numbers", "Find some numbers nearby", "Could be a number plate, a clock face, your phone, a newspaper" ]
rows.ellicitMsg: What do those numbers add up to?

rows.messages: [ "Try thinking of a movie you watched recently", "Think about the plot", "Then think about the characters" ]
rows.ellicitMsg: What was the movie you were thinking about?

rows.messages: [ "Try thinking of a song you heard recently", "Think about the beat", "Then think about the instruments" ]
rows.ellicitMsg: What was the song you were thinking about?

rows.messages: [ "Try thinking of a musical artist you heard recently", "Think about their style", "Then think about their genre" ]
rows.ellicitMsg: What was the artist you were thinking about?

rows.messages: [ "Try counting your breaths as you inhale", "Concentrate on the air filling your lungs", "Focus on the the air entering your nose" ]
rows.ellicitMsg: How many breaths did you take?

rows.messages: [ "Pick up or touch an object near you", "It could be a pen, the wall or even your own clothing", "Concentrate on the texture" ]
[ "Look around slowly", "Take notice of ojects around you", "Pick 5 different items and focus on them", "Look at their colour, their shape" ]
rows.ellicitMsg: What was one of the objects?

rows.messages: [ "Take your time finding 4 objects nearby", "Pick up or touch the items you found", "Think about their texture, their shape" ]
rows.ellicitMsg: What was one of the objects?

rows.messages: [ "Close your eyes and notice the sounds around you", "Pick 3 different sounds near or far", "Focus on the direction, the pitch ]
rows.ellicitMsg: What was one of the sounds?

rows.messages: [ " Take a few large breaths", "Feel and smell the air going into your nose", "Focus on the smell in the air" ]
[ "Try to remember the last thing you ate or drank", "Think about the taste, the smell" ]
rows.ellicitMsg: What did you eat or drink last?

rows.messages: [ "Take long slow breaths from your core", "Picture letting your fear and worry leave when you exhale" ]
rows.ellicitMsg: Do you feel a weight lifted from your chest?

rows.messages: [ "Take long slow breaths from your core", "Picture letting your fear and worry leave when you exhale" ]
rows.ellicitMsg: Do you feel a weight lifted from your chest?

rows.messages: [ "Wiggle your fingers and move your toes", "Pay attention to the movement and feeling", "You are in control of your body" ]
rows.ellicitMsg: Do you feel the control you have?
